A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Episode 1 was better then this piece of crap. This was one of the worst movies I've ever seen. If Force Awakens burned what was left of the Star Wars Universe which I loved. The Last Jedi urinates on on the ashes. The movie was slow\, had plot hole after plot hole and a feminist barf fest.
